summary: A ENB designed for playing the game. Enhances game with richer colors and minimal drag on performance.
descriptionHtml:
[heading] Realistic Lighting Version Available! [/heading]

Requires ENB series 0.119. You can get it here http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm

[heading] Intro [/heading]
Welcome to my custom enb! The original purpose for this enb (like every other enb) was for personal use, but since I haven\'t found one like it I felt obligated to upload it.

[heading] The plan [/heading]
A ENB designed for playing the game. Enhances game with richer colors and minimal drag on performance. This enb will come out in 2 versions. One will be for vanilla lighting, the second one will be used  with http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654 Realistic Lighting With Customization. I will probably move to other lighting mods in the future, if the demand is there.

[heading] Other stuff I want to say [/heading]
This ENB was highly influenced by Witcher 2, and its act 1 forests. 
This ENB doesn\'t add Depth of field since it\'s not something I personally like.
 Any other questions or suggests I will happily respond to in the comments, I hope you enjoy using my ENB!

[heading] Installation [/heading] 
This video is how I found out how, only fair to give then the credit!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bhb1m1Pd_0c

[heading] Credits [/heading]
LSiwora, not only for inspiration but, her ENB, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123  The Wilds was the starting point for this ENB.
author: LilAk
